claim: Spider-Man has only been portrayed by one actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Academy Award-winning actor J. K. Simmons portrayed the character in Sam Raimi 's Spider-Man trilogy , as well as voicing him in various additional works such as The Avengers : Earth 's Mightiest Heroes , Avengers Assemble , Ultimate Spider-Man , Lego Marvel Super Heroes : Maximum Overload and Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. .

claim: Spider-Man has only been portrayed by one actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Separately , Marvel has also published books featuring alternate versions of Spider-Man , including Spider-Man 2099 , which features the adventures of Miguel O'Hara , the Spider-Man of the future ; Ultimate Spider-Man , which features the adventures of a teenaged Peter Parker in an alternate universe ; and Ultimate Comics Spider-Man , which depicts the teenager Miles Morales , who takes up the mantle of Spider-Man after Ultimate Peter Parker 's supposed death .

claim: Spider-Man has only been portrayed by one actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It was a direct continuation , in terms of creative teams and storylines , of the previous Web of Spider-Man series in the same way that the other three primary Spider-Man series  (  The Amazing Spider-Man , Spectacular Spider-Man , and Spider-Man  )  were replaced by Amazing Scarlet Spider , Spectacular Scarlet Spider , and Scarlet Spider respectively during this period .

claim: Spider-Man has only been portrayed by one actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Other writers have portrayed him more humanly , as a humorously obnoxious yet caring boss who nevertheless has shown great bravery and integrity in the face of the assorted villains with which the Bugle comes into contact , and whose campaign against Spider-Man comes more from fear of youngsters following his example .

claim: Spider-Man has only been portrayed by one actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In films , Spider-Man has been portrayed by actors Tobey Maguire  (  2002 -- 2007  )  and Andrew Garfield  (  2012 -- 2014  )  , while Tom Holland portrays the character in the Marvel Cinematic Universe , first appearing in Captain America : Civil War in 2016 .
